flawed_nl_solution:
Lucy can read 20 more pages than Oliver who can read 40 pages so Lucy can read 40+20 = <<20+40=30>>30 pages
Carter can read half as many pages as Lucy who can read 30 pages so he can read 30/2 = <<15=15>>15 pages in 1 hour

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 30. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
